TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMutableEntityType implements class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Infrastructure.IAnnotatable, class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IEntityType, class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IMutableAnnotatable, class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IMutableTypeBase, class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.ITypeBase
Public Interface IMutableEntityType Implements IEntityType, IMutableTypeBase
type IMutableEntityType = interface interface IEntityType interface ITypeBase interface IAnnotatable interface IMutableTypeBase interface IMutableAnnotatable

summary.para: This interface is used during model creation and allows the metadata to be modified. Once the model is built, represents a ready-only view of the same metadata.

Docs.param: The properties that the foreign key is defined on.

The entity type that the relationship targets. This may be different from the type that is defined on when the relationship targets a derived type in an inheritance hierarchy (since the key is defined on the base type of the hierarchy).
Docs.summary: Adds a new relationship to this entity.

Public Function FindForeignKey (properties As IReadOnlyList(Of IProperty), principalKey As IKey, principalEntityType As IEntityType) As IMutableForeignKey

Docs.param: The properties that the foreign key is defined on.
The primary or alternate key that is referenced.

The entity type that the relationship targets. This may be different from the type that is defined on when the relationship targets a derived type in an inheritance hierarchy (since the key is defined on the base type of the hierarchy).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IMutableKey FindPrimaryKey() cil managed

summary.para: Gets primary key for this entity. Returns null if no primary key is defined.

To be a valid model, each entity type must have a primary key defined. Therefore, the primary key may be null while the model is being created, but will be present by the time the model is used with a .

Docs.returns: The primary key, or null if none is defined.

Docs.param: The name of the property.

summary.para: Gets the property with a given name. Returns null if no property with the given name is defined.
This API only finds scalar properties and does not find navigation properties. Use to find a navigation property.

Docs.returns: The property, or null if none is found.
